participant_1.name: Emma Thompson
participant_1.personality: Emma is friendly and outgoing, always eager to connect with others.
participant_1.background: She grew up in a small town and has a passion for community service.

participant_2.name: Liam Johnson
participant_2.personality: Liam is thoughtful and observant, often taking the time to listen before speaking.
participant_2.background: He has a background in psychology and enjoys helping people understand themselves better.
